name: Downloadable Game
description:
Downloadable Game is an interactive piece of software in which you talk to strangers and collect enough pieces of bacon to open some doors

DOWNLOADABLE GAME FEATURES:

  • 4 uninspired areas to explore!
  • Tens upon tens of dumb one-liners to groan at!!!
  • 50 "hidden" bacon strips to flood your collectathon-addicted brain with dopamine!!
  • Secrets to uncover???
  • Exclamation marks!!!!!!!

This is the first interactive project I have ever finished, and was made with the intention to get better acquainted with the RPG Maker engine, as well as to give some of my friends a little laugh. If this managed to catch your attention then I hope it was somehow able to also give you a little laugh, or at least just smile for a few seconds
